Hey guys!

I'm new at the Heritrix so I apologize in advance if I've missed something
in the documentation but I have a dubt about DecideRule in Heritrix.
I'm testing Heritrix to crawl .org top level domains; using decide rules
with a SURT I reject all uris that doen't uses this surt prefix, but..

Can I use a regular expression as seed or I must introduce one seed like
www.example.org?


Thank you!
WP

--0016e644ce1c996a580462a81b9c
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hey guys!<br>
<br>
I'm new at the Heritrix so I apologize in advance if I've missed 
something in the documentation but I have a dubt about DecideRule in Heritrix.  <br>I'm
testing Heritrix to crawl .org top level domains; using decide rules
with a SURT I reject all uris that doen't uses this surt prefix, but.. <br>

<br>Can I use a regular expression as seed or I must introduce one seed like <a href="http://www.example.org/" target="_blank">www.example.org</a>?<br><br>
<br>
Thank you!<br>
WP

--0016e644ce1c996a580462a81b9c--
